summary: A forest ranger with the ability to visit the past by looking at photographs attempts to solve the mystery behind his father's sudden death.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Ayesha Takia|Javed Jaffrey|Girish Karnad|Ananth Narayan Mahadevan|Benjamin Gilani|John Sampson|Rushad Rana|Sharmila Tagore|Uttara Baokar|Pia Shah|Smita Hai|Wendy Lumby|Fran McKay|Caryn Pitcher|Andrea Tully
keywords: photograph|twin brother|villain played by lead actor|tragic villain|blood transfusion
title: 8 x 10 Tasveer
